title: Olivia Wilde | James And The Giant Breach
description:
New York State is suing the former president for bank fraud, and Russia’s leader announced a major escalation of the war in Ukraine. “Don’t Worry Darling” director Olivia Wilde says people will look for drama anywhere they can, especially when it comes to superstars like Harry Styles, Florence Pugh and Chris Pine who got caught up in the conspiracy theory known as “Spitgate.” Listen as Olivia clears up this rumor and more surrounding her cast, and check out the film when it opens in theaters this Friday.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
